system.description:
When you take this move, choose Lightning, Ice, or Poison. The chosen element works like your Fire, as a ranged weapon you use in the same manner. Add the element you chose to your Gear:

You may take this move multiple times, choosing a different element each time. Each of your elements reloads separately.
system.choices:
• Lightning: Your Lightning is (Ranged, Reload, Piercing).
  • Ice: Your Ice slows those it hits, giving Hope to Finish Them, Keep Them Busy, or Get Away from them. It is also (Ranged, Reload).
  • Poison: Your Poison is (Ranged, Reload, Necrotic).
